>My wife warned me to be careful with my stuff but i left my backpack where it was.

Listen to your wife.

If anyone approaches you unbidden, blank them. If their story doesn't add up, blank them. Don't leave your luggage unattended.

Dude- dont carry a backpack with you. You can wear a man purse- but pay attention to your zippers. Pay attention not to look like a tourist as much as possible and you should be good. Just a matter of not looking like a easy target.
